title: We’re Hiring: Media Buyer (Remote, Philippines) | SaaS
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Media Buyer (Remote, Philippines) | SaaS
Company: LeadStream Ai
Location: Remote (Philippines only)
Type: Full-time, Independent Contractor
Rate: $5–$6/hour USD, based on experience + performance bonuses
Schedule: 9am to 5pm PST / FullUpgrade to see actual info 40 hours a week

About Us
LeadStream Ai is a fast-growing SaaS business helping modern companies [brief description—e.g., automate tasks, streamline workflows, improve analytics]. We're hiring a Media Buyer to lead and scale full-funnel paid campaigns across multiple platforms and DTC brands.

You Will Be Responsible For
Building, launching, and optimizing full-funnel campaigns on Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Google Ads, and TikTok, Reddit.


Writing ad briefs, developing hook scripts, and collaborating with UGC creators to produce platform-native creative content.


Managing daily pacing, budget allocation, and scaling strategies to maximize performance and efficiency.


Executing ongoing creative testing and iterating based on multi-platform performance data.


Tracking and reporting on KPIs: ROAS, CAC, CTR, and blended MER. Delivering weekly/monthly reports with actionable insights.


Collaborating closely with brand managers and creatives to align campaigns with strategic business goals.


Maintaining and evolving campaign structures to support segmentation, funnel logic, and product focus.


Staying current on ad platform updates, policy changes, and creative trends. Actively implementing new features and strategies.


Optionally managing TikTok Ads/Spark Ads where UGC pipelines are active.


Overseeing paid campaigns for 2–3 DTC brands depending on complexity and spend.


Balancing strategic planning and hands-on execution to ensure consistent results and high creative standards.



Ideal Profile
Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience running performance campaigns on Meta, Google, and TikTok


Strong grasp of full-funnel media strategy, targeting, scaling, and optimization


Proven success managing creative pipelines, writing briefs, and coordinating UGC production


Advanced understanding of paid performance metrics: ROAS, CAC, LTV, MER


Skilled in budget pacing, bid strategy adjustments, and segmented audience targeting


Experience with A/B testing frameworks and interpreting multi-platform campaign data


Ability to manage 2–3 brands simultaneously with varied spend levels


Highly organized, analytical, proactive, and a clear communicator



What’s On Offer?
Leadership Role with ownership of key brand accounts


Opportunity to work within a high-performance SaaS company with a proven track record


Fantastic Remote Culture with autonomy, accountability, and growth


Flexible working hours and a supportive global team


Continuous learning and advancement opportunities



How to Apply
Send your CV, Portfolio and a brief 1–2 minute video answering:
Why are you interested in this role?


Share one paid campaign you managed and what made it successful.
